welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Hagta, Guam! Immerse yourself in the island's rich history and breathtaking beauty as you explore our charming city. From white sand beaches to historical landmarks, we invite you to enjoy all that Hagta has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Andersen AFB Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Andersen AFB Airport, mainly used for military and cargo flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but connection speeds may vary.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Guam International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Guam International Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
